It would be pretty weird for the police to adopt a code that could be conf=
used between going to the doctor, or seeing someone shot.=A0 I sure wouldn'=
t want to report a Code 7, and risk a SWAT team breaking into the dentist j=
ust when the drill was going into my mouth.

wn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:

To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, May 11, 2009, 8:28 AM











    
       =
     
            


      
      Yep thats what=A0I saw too thats why I sa=
id I'd have to question more because what the trooper told me doesnt quite =
make sense to me compared to what I found online. Maybe Aprils right I dont=
 know until I ask. Maybe just a nice way of asking over the airwaves.
=A0
O=
ut of service =3D dead perhaps without spreading false alarm to anyone whos=
 listening. I have no clue. Will let ya know later why he said that. 
=A0
M=
isty

From: Rj <rast=

True - except there are other codes for fatalities, accidents, and trauma=
.
Code 7 means things like home, on personal time, in court, etc.

http://w=
ww.radiolab s.com/police- codes.html
http://www.yougetin fo.com/info/ PolCo=
des. html

----- Original Message -----

C@yahoogroups .com

Code 7 is either code for=
 being out of service (short for 10-7), or a meal break:

http://www.radiol=
ab s.com/police- codes.html
http://www.yougetin fo.com/info/ PolCodes. html=



--- On Sun, 5/10/09, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@ yahoo.com> wrote:


From: =
Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@ yahoo.com>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] The Seven - interest=
ing tidbit of info
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: Sunday, May 10, 2009,=
 9:31 PM









Tonight at work I was talking to a state trooper, there h=
ad been an accident. I asked him if there were any deaths (it was very very=
 bad) and he said he didnt know so he got on his radio and called in and as=
ked them if it was a 7 at the site. They told him negative, and he told me =
the little boy who was the worst off was still alive. I asked him why did y=
ou ask them if it was a 7. He said code 7, I was asking them if they were d=
ead. So if you ever hear anyone call 7 over the radio that means someones d=
ead.
=A0
Just thought I would pass that on. I find it interesting since I k=
now alot of us have heard this before when used to describe who is speaking=
 rather than a name they say seven.
=A0
Misty





      
 

      

    
 =
